languages.text: "Сюда паства приходит, чтобы покаяться, изложить сокровенные мысли и наблюдения за ближними. Священная машина записывает все исповеди и обрабатывает голоса прихожан, делая их неузнаваемыми".

traits.locale_text: "Сюда паства приходит, чтобы покаяться, изложить сокровенные мысли и наблюдения за ближними. Священная машина записывает все исповеди и обрабатывает голоса прихожан, делая их неузнаваемыми".

languages.text: "Our parishioners come here to repent, to share their innermost thoughts and observations of their neighbours. The sacred machine records all confessions and alters the voices beyond recognition."
languages.original_text: "Сюда паства приходит, чтобы покаяться, изложить сокровенные мысли и наблюдения за ближними. Священная машина записывает все исповеди и обрабатывает голоса прихожан, делая их неузнаваемыми".

traits.locale_text: "Our parishioners come here to repent, to share their innermost thoughts and observations of their neighbours. The sacred machine records all confessions and alters the voices beyond recognition."
"This is our automated confessional. It's where our parishioners send their penances, innermost thoughts, and observations of their neighbours."
"Our parishioners come here to repent, to share their innermost thoughts and observations of their neighbours. The sacred machine records all confessions and alters the voices beyond recognition."
"This is our automated confessional. It's where our parishioners send their penances, innermost thoughts, and observations of their neighbours."
"Our parishioners come here to repent, to share their innermost thoughts and observations of their neighbours. The sacred machine records all confessions and alters the voices beyond recognition."
"Our parishioners come here to repent, to share their innermost thoughts and observations of their neighbours. The sacred machine records all confessions and alters the voices beyond recognition."
"Our parishioners come here to repent, to share their innermost thoughts and observations of their neighbours. The sacred machine records all confessions and alters the voices beyond recognition."
"Our parishioners come here to repent, to share their innermost thoughts and observations of their neighbours. The sacred machine records all confessions and alters the voices beyond recognition."

languages.text: « Nos paroissiens viennent ici pour se repentir, partager leurs pensées les plus intimes et leurs observations concernant leurs voisins. La machine sacrée enregistre toutes les confessions avant de modifier les voix de manière à les rendre méconnaissables. »
languages.original_text: "Our parishioners come here to repent, to share their innermost thoughts and observations of their neighbours. The sacred machine records all confessions and alters the voices beyond recognition."

traits.locale_text: « Nos paroissiens viennent ici pour se repentir, partager leurs pensées les plus intimes et leurs observations concernant leurs voisins. La machine sacrée enregistre toutes les confessions avant de modifier les voix de manière à les rendre méconnaissables. »

languages.text: «Nuestros feligreses lo usan para declarar sus penitencias, revelar sus pensamientos más secretos y dar testimonio sobre sus semejantes. La sagrada máquina recopila todas sus confesiones y altera sus voces para que no puedan reconocerse».
languages.original_text: "Our parishioners come here to repent, to share their innermost thoughts and observations of their neighbours. The sacred machine records all confessions and alters the voices beyond recognition."

traits.locale_text: «Nuestros feligreses lo usan para declarar sus penitencias, revelar sus pensamientos más secretos y dar testimonio sobre sus semejantes. La sagrada máquina recopila todas sus confesiones y altera sus voces para que no puedan reconocerse».

languages.text: “我们的教区居民会来这里忏悔，分享他们内心深处的想法，以及对周围人的观察结果。这台神圣的机器会记录下所有人的忏悔内容，同时对声音进行处理，抹除所有可以识别身份的内容。”
languages.original_text: "Our parishioners come here to repent, to share their innermost thoughts and observations of their neighbours. The sacred machine records all confessions and alters the voices beyond recognition."

traits.locale_text: “我们的教区居民会来这里忏悔，分享他们内心深处的想法，以及对周围人的观察结果。这台神圣的机器会记录下所有人的忏悔内容，同时对声音进行处理，抹除所有可以识别身份的内容。”

languages.text: 「信徒は悔い改め、心の奥底に秘めた思いや隣人に対する観察を分かち合うためにここにやってくる。聖なる機械はすべての告白を記録し、その声を識別できないほど改ざんする」
languages.original_text: "Our parishioners come here to repent, to share their innermost thoughts and observations of their neighbours. The sacred machine records all confessions and alters the voices beyond recognition."

traits.locale_text: 「信徒は悔い改め、心の奥底に秘めた思いや隣人に対する観察を分かち合うためにここにやってくる。聖なる機械はすべての告白を記録し、その声を識別できないほど改ざんする」

languages.text: Die Mitglieder unserer Gemeinde kommen hierher, um zu büßen, um ihre innersten Gedanken und ihre Beobachtungen ihre Nachbarn zu teilen." Die heilige Maschine zeichnet alle Bekenntnisse auf und macht die Stimmen unkenntlich."
languages.original_text: "Our parishioners come here to repent, to share their innermost thoughts and observations of their neighbours. The sacred machine records all confessions and alters the voices beyond recognition."

traits.locale_text: Die Mitglieder unserer Gemeinde kommen hierher, um zu büßen, um ihre innersten Gedanken und ihre Beobachtungen ihre Nachbarn zu teilen." Die heilige Maschine zeichnet alle Bekenntnisse auf und macht die Stimmen unkenntlich."

languages.text: "Cemaatimizin üyeleri buraya gelerek günah çıkarır, en derinlerdeki düşüncelerini ve komşularına dair gözlemlerini paylaşırlar. Kutsal makine tüm itirafları kaydeder ve sesleri değiştirerek tanınmayacak hâle getirir."
languages.original_text: "Our parishioners come here to repent, to share their innermost thoughts and observations of their neighbours. The sacred machine records all confessions and alters the voices beyond recognition."
